![grid](shot-through-the-heart.png)

Classic [Shakashaka rules](https://puzz.link/rules.html?shakashaka) apply.
Red lines must lie on the edges of rectangles.

Solve the puzzle on [Penpa](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&a=VY9LDgQhCAXv4pqFIh/dzjU63v8aPdNULyYxgeKFUq/ryN9po3fRT5NvM2RWo+9k1kS3jF+dXeypCk+Y3MhtlMC09s1gL3ZyJw98gS8MdnjBuzjxJb4MOGHes/jRYn+xv3vxfu4/5wY=). Happy Valentine's Day!
